---
title: Generalized Assignment Problem
---

```{r}
results = read.csv("../results_GAP_idol.csv", header = FALSE)
colnames(results) = c("instance", "approach", "n_knapsacks", "n_items", "obj", "time")
```

```{r}
approaches = unique(results$approach)
```

```{r}
library(tidyr)
times = spread(results[,-5], key = approach, value = time)
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
library(rmarkdown)
paged_table(times)
```

```{r}
times$time.best = apply(times[,-c(1:3)], 1, FUN = min)
ratios = times[,c(4:5)] / times$time.best
colnames(ratios) = paste0(approaches, ".ratio")
times = cbind(times, ratios)
paged_table(times)
```
